traits.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
